channel.title: Few questions
channel.description:
first question : npcdrops.cgf :
Whats the right way to fill in this ? lil explane what all thing are :) this is what i see : //--------NPCID---------DropType--------Item----Amount--
do you need to fill in this somwhere els to ? or when filled in here all npc (exampel) with id 19 will drop this ? (i want it that way )
Second question : objects.cfg : this i what i see : //-------objID--objX----objY----height--face----type----open?
what does all this means ?
3the question: autospawn.cfg: this is what i see : //----NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption
what does this all mean ?( i know all exept : range... , walktype )
This is it for now :)

u use object = …

with objects i used my own coordinates end items but still dont work

item.title: Few questions
item.dc:creator: @zammyking111 zammyking111
item.description:
@zammyking111 wrote:

[quote=“supra s, post:5, topic:143253”]npc drops not working :
//--------NPCID---------DropType--------Item----Amount–
19 Dragon 1214 1

[ENDOFNPCDROPLIST]

objects not working :
//-------objID–objX----objY----height–face----type----open?
spawn = 9299 3263 3420 1 1 1 1[/quote]
of course thats not gonna work i gave an example not a real object etc i was at school =.=

Read full topic

k this is how, and yes sometimes in it it actually is spaces:

object (SPACE) = (SPACE) 1530 (TAB) 3228 (TAB) 3240 (TAB) 0 (TAB) -3 (TAB) 2 (TAB)false (TAB) Lumbridge

As far as i know

item.title: Few questions
item.dc:creator: @Sin2 Sin_
item.description:
@Sin2 wrote:

[quote=“supra s, post:3, topic:143253”]i added in object.cfg :
spawn = 9299 3263 3420 1 1 1 1

saved , compiled but when i go end look there is nothing :’(
-> gona check other codes to[/quote]

You have to tab it, not use spacebar.

item.title: Few questions
item.dc:creator: @zammyking111 zammyking111
item.description:
@zammyking111 wrote:

Examples:

  1. //--------NPCID---------DropType--------Item----Amount–
    01 Dragon 1214 1
    Ok for this you would get the npc’s id and put it where the npc’s id is at and drop type i think you would put the name of the item and the item you would put the Items Id and amount of course how much you want it to drop.

2.//-------objID–objX----objY----height–face----type----open?
0912 222 261 1 1 1 1
I think if you put 0 that the door is closed

3.//----NpcID—CoordX–CoordY–Height–RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption
981 766 536 1 0 0 0 0 1 Monster
ok for the npc id you would get an Npc’s id then you would put it there and then for the cord X and the cord Y you would get that in the server and the hight you would put 1 and for the ranges its where you want the monsters to walk to and the walk type doesnt really matter and the description would be what you want to remind you of the monster it really doesnt matter.

Hopefully that has helped you

Read full topic
